name: Lloyd Law Office
tag_list: personal-injury, car-accidents, truck-accidents, premises-liability, wrongful-death-claims, motorcycle-accidents, slips-and-falls, product-liability
overview:
The personal injury attorneys at Lloyd Law Office bring more than 50 years of combined legal experience to the table when helping accident victims. We are a family business and we represent families who have been harmed through the fault of others. We have handled cases ranging from minor neck and back injuries to life threatening injuries and wrongful death claims.

Our mission at Lloyd Law Office is to aggressively fight for victims of personal injuries in Bloomington and throughout Indiana. We are a family business, and we represent families that have been injured through the fault of others.

If you or a loved one has been injured in a car accident, motorcycle accident, by a defective product or a negligent property owner, you may be entitled to compensation for your medical bills, loss of income, pain and suffering, and other damages. You owe it to yourself to talk with a compassionate injury lawyer at Lloyd Law Office to understand your legal rights. The decisions you make in your case may help prevent someone else from suffering a similar injury and make our community a safer place.
